casebody.data:
LAFARGE NORTH AMERICA, INCORPORATED, et al., petitioners,
v.
ST. BERNARD PARISH, LOUISIANA. No. 13-1212. Supreme Court of the United States June 30, 2014.

Case below, 550 Fed.Appx. 184.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.
